articles.description: The newest members of Nebraska football have a message for the B1G.
articles.content:
Vincent Carroll-Jackson is sending out Christmas joy to Nebraska fans, and a warning to the rest of the B1G.
The Husker defensive lineman posted to Twitter a photo of the newest recruits set to terr… [+1297 chars]

articles.title: What's YOUR favorite “golf is hard” moment? - PGA TOUR
articles.description: Golf is hard, and even the best players on the PGA TOUR are relatable at times. Check out some of the best “golf is hard” moments from 2022.#ShortsSUBSCRIBE ...

articles.title: NHL Highlights | Canadiens vs. Stars - December 23, 2022 - SPORTSNET
articles.description: Roope Hintz scored a pair and Jason Robertson dished two assists as the Dallas Stars defeated the Montreal Canadiens 4-2.
